select s.studentid id,s.studentname name,de.departmentname,du.dutyname from student s LEFT JOIN department de ON s.departmentid = de.departmentid LEFT JOIN duty du ON s.dutyid = du.dutyid where s.studentname like concat("%",#{studentname},"%")
